topics.body:
I'd probably be a veritable renaissance man who's wildly successful at everything I try, but the tradeoff would be that I'm never satisfied with anything I do so I give it up soon afterward.

And I'd probably be a self-centered prick as well.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541532536368727393610000#post_541532536368727393610000

I just focused a shit ton on food and when everything was normal went onto logging and firewood. And went out to the extra shit I wanted/needed from there. On my second village at least.

The closest I came to shooting myself in the foot was a baby-making crisis during which most people in my village weren't having children. I had to rush a chapel and Town Hall and all that to get people happy enough to shit babies and then to attract gypsy nomads.
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001
